SEARCH
Package controller.controllerLocation

Class LocationController

java.lang.Object
controller.controllerLocation.LocationController
public class LocationController extends Object
Controller class for managing locations in the game. This class acts as an intermediary between the LocationModel and LocationView. It handles operations related to location data, rendering map elements, updating the visual representation, and managing location-specific entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    LocationController(LocationModel locationModel)
    Constructs a new LocationController with the specified location model.

  • Constructor Details

    • LocationController

      public LocationController(LocationModel locationModel)
      Constructs a new LocationController with the specified location model. Initializes the controller with a reference to the location model and creates a new LocationView that will be managed by this controller.
      Parameters:
      locationModel - the model containing the location's data

  • Method Details

    • getLocationView

      public LocationView getLocationView()
      Gets the location view associated with this controller.
      Returns:
      the LocationView instance

    • getLocationModel

      public LocationModel getLocationModel()
      Gets the location model associated with this controller.
      Returns:
      the LocationModel instance

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Gets the width of this location's map grid.
      Returns:
      the width as an integer

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Gets the height of this location's map grid.
      Returns:
      the height as an integer

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of this location.
      Returns:
      a string representing the location's name

    • getLocElements

      public HashMap<Point,Cell> getLocElements()
      Converts the location's model elements to view cell elements. Maps each point in the location to its corresponding visual Cell, including items and exits with their appropriate representations.
      Returns:
      a HashMap mapping coordinate points to Cell objects

    • loadLocation

      public void loadLocation()
      Initializes the location view if it hasn't been set up yet. Checks if the grid has been initialized and, if not, populates it with the appropriate map elements.

    • updateItems

      public void updateItems()
      Updates the visual representation of items in the location. Refreshes the view by checking all points in the location model and adding visual items where they exist in the model but not in the view.

    • hasMonster

      public boolean hasMonster()
      Checks if this location contains a monster.
      Returns:
      true if a monster exists in this location, false otherwise

    • removeMonster

      public void removeMonster()
      Removes the monster from this location. Sets the monster reference in the location model to null, effectively removing the monster from the game world.
